content.en: Odor source localization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to accurately locate odors and pollutant sources in various environments. They have modified algorithms like Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) and developed new ones like the Infotaxis algorithm to improve the performance of odor source localization. These algorithms are being used in multi-robot systems to locate time-varying sources in dynamic indoor environments, and even bionic swarm intelligence algorithms are being tested to locate pollutant sources in indoor environments with weak airflow.
content.da: Lokalisering af lugtkilder: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til nøjagtigt at lokalisere lugtkilder og forureningskilder i forskellige miljøer. De har modificeret algoritmer som Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) og udviklet nye som Infotaxi-algoritmen for at forbedre præstationen af lugtkildelokalisering. Disse algoritmer bruges i multi-robotsystemer til at lokalisere tidsskiftende kilder i dynamiske indendørsmiljøer, og endda bioniske sværmintelligensalgoritmer testes for at lokalisere forureningskilder i indendørsmiljøer med svag luftstrøm.
